summary: "La La Land" is a 2016 American musical romantic comedy-drama film written and directed by Damien Chazelle. It stars Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone as a jazz pianist and an aspiring actress who fall in love while chasing their dreams in Los Angeles. The film was first thought up by Chazelle and Justin Hurwitz while at Harvard. After struggling to find funding, the project was picked up after Chazelle's success with "Whiplash." Filming took place in Los Angeles in 2015. The film was a big hit, making $472 million worldwide and winning many awards, including six Oscars. It's considered one of the best films of the 21st century.
title: La La Land
